Class Deniz_DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deniz_DatabaseConnection

  • public class Deniz_DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that establishes connection with the MySQL server and contains methods for creating database and tables, dropping database and tables, adding new data and querying old data. During the creation of this class, the following link was used as a basis with modification and addition for project specific methods: http://www.tutorialspoint.com/jdbc/jdbc-sample-code.htm The site was first accessed on May 5th, 2016
    Since:
    05102016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Deniz Celik

      • initializeDB

        private static void initializeDB()
        Initialize connection with database if not already connected

      • executeSQLStatement

        private static boolean executeSQLStatement(java.lang.String sql)
        Helper method for executing a given sql statement. Only works for sql statements that are prepared and take no input.
        Parameters:
        sql - MySQL string to be executed
        Returns:
        true if the statement was executed without error false if the statement was malformed or encountered an error during execution

      • dropDatabase

        public static boolean dropDatabase()
        Drop deniz_database if it exists
        Returns:
        true if the statement was executed without error false if the statement encountered an error during execution

      • createDatabase

        public static boolean createDatabase()
        Create deniz_database if it does not exist
        Returns:
        true if the statement was executed without error false if the statement encountered an error during execution

      • useDatabase

        public static boolean useDatabase()
        Tells MySQL to select deniz_database for any further SQL actions
        Returns:
        true if the statement was executed without error false if the statement encountered an error during execution

      • createTable

        public static boolean createTable(java.lang.Boolean isWiki)
        Create a new table for storing WikiData or UserData depending on the value of isWiki.
        Parameters:
        isWiki - true for creation of deniz_wiki_data table false for creation of deniz_user_data table
        Returns:
        true if the statement was executed without error false if the statement encountered an error during execution

      • dropTable

        public static boolean dropTable(java.lang.Boolean isWiki)
        Drops the WikiData or UserData table from the database
        Parameters:
        isWiki - true for deletion of deniz_wiki_data table false for deletion of deniz_user_data table
        Returns:
        true if the statement was executed without error false if the statement encountered an error during execution

      • orderTable

        public static boolean orderTable(java.lang.Boolean isWiki)
        Orders the WikiData or UserData table for cleaner results and querys
        Parameters:
        isWiki - true for ordering of deniz_wiki_data table false for ordering of deniz_user_data table
        Returns:
        true if the statement was executed without error false if the statement encountered an error during execution

      • queryData

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Deniz_Data> queryData(int year,
                                                        java.lang.Boolean isWiki)
        Allows for querying of tables for a given year
        Parameters:
        year - Year to query in table
        isWiki - true for deletion of deniz_wiki_data table false for deletion of deniz_user_data table
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Deniz_Data that matches the given year query
